My relationship with this game is the most toxic thing i've ever experienced in my entire life. (worse than my ex) The only thing I think about when I'm playing it is: 'why didn't i commit suicide yet' and 'oh my god I hate this game so much imma delete it soon' but i swear it's impossible to quit, it always finds a way to come back to me and bring out the worst in me.
DO NOT download this game, go play candy crush and enjoy a better life not knowing what pain is.
Un buen juego, tiltea pero es buenísimo.

Csgo is the type of game your going to love playing at first, it's going to be fun until you rank up just a little bit. then your gonna get toxic Teammates who team kill you, Pros that are creating new accounts just to play with Noobs just to get free kills. your gonna put a lot of time into the game telling yourself you can get better but you can't get better when all there is, are people who have top tier hardware giving them a advantage, hackers in 1 out of 3 games or just toxic people in mostly every game who tell you to " kill yourself " or Literally pull your IP,

after 72 More hours, the game literally gets worse. There is no upside.
